New_Rochelle.Knickerbocker Building:
The Knickerbocker Building is an eclectic, Dutch Colonial Revival  industrial building located at 50-52 Webster Avenue in the city of New Rochelle, Westchester County, New York.


== Description ==
The Knickerbocker Press Building is actually a connected series of large brick industrial buildings, with Dutch or Flemish stepped gables and a square four-story tower. The building has three sections, the main section sited with its eaves parallel to the street, and two smaller gable front sections connected on the east side of the main building.
